display_name: Central Apnea-Hypopnea Index: (central apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used and with or without arousal+ hypopneas with > 30% flow reduction and >= 3% oxygen desaturation and with or without arousal) / hour of sleep
calculation: 60 * (hrembp3 + hrop3 + hnrbp3 + hnrop3 + urbp3 + urop3 + unrbp3 + unrop3 + carbp + carop + canbp + canop) / slpprdp
